00006 EagleDbTable* EagleDbTable_New(char *name)
00007 {
00008     EagleDbTable *table = (EagleDbTable*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbTable_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbTable));
00009     if(NULL == table) {
00010         return NULL;
00011     }
00012     
00013     table->name = (NULL == name ? NULL : strdup(name));
00014     table->allocatedColumns = 16;
00015     table->usedColumns = 0;
00016     table->columns = (EagleDbColumn**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbTable_New.2", sizeof(EagleDbColumn*), table->allocatedColumns);
00017     if(NULL == table->columns) {
00018         EagleMemory_Free(table->name);
00019         EagleMemory_Free(table);
00020         return NULL;
00021     }
00022     
00023     return table;
00024 }

00026 void EagleDbTable_setColumns(EagleDbTable *table, EagleDbColumn** columns, int count)
00027 {
00028     /* free existing memory */
00029     EagleMemory_Free(table->columns);
00030     
00031     /* set new columns */
00032     table->allocatedColumns = count;
00033     table->usedColumns = count;
00034     table->columns = columns;
00035 }

00037 void EagleDbTable_Delete(EagleDbTable *table)
00038 {
00039     EagleMemory_Free(table->columns);
00040     EagleMemory_Free(table->name);
00041     EagleMemory_Free(table);
00042 }

00044 void EagleDbTable_DeleteWithColumns(EagleDbTable *table)
00045 {
00046     int i;
00047     
00048     for(i = 0; i < table->usedColumns; ++i) {
00049         EagleDbColumn_Delete(table->columns[i]);
00050     }
00051     EagleMemory_Free(table->columns);
00052     
00053     EagleMemory_Free(table->name);
00054     EagleMemory_Free(table);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void EagleDbTable_addColumn(EagleDbTable *table, EagleDbColumn *column)
00058 {
00059     table->columns[table->usedColumns++] = column;
00060 }
